Datapoint receiver

POST https://aide.syncleus.com/robotek/customers/receiver
Request parameters
{{datapoint.key}} {{datapoint.type}} {{datapoint.description}}
{{datapoint.rangeMin}}-∞ to {{datapoint.rangeMax}}∞ {{datapoint.states}}
Request example
Content-Type: application/json
Response example
201 Datapoint successfully recorded.
Content-Type: application/json

Insight analysis

GET https://aide.syncleus.com/robotek/customers/insight
Request parameters
given Map A map describing the known properties of the datapoint
{{datapoint.key}} {{datapoint.type}} {{datapoint.description}}
{{datapoint.rangeMin}}-∞ to {{datapoint.rangeMax}}∞ {{datapoint.states}}
target String A string indicating the boolean logic for the fields being analyzed for.
Request example
Content-Type: application/json
Response example
201 Insight successfully analyzed.
Content-Type: application/json
